description: Develop and maintain frontend, backend and databases.
Implement and integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services.
Build responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React.
Participate in pull request to ensure code quality and best practices.
Create and execute tests using testing frameworks like Jest, Mocha, or Pytest.
Track and manage tasks using project management tools like Jira or Trello.
Deploy applications to cloud platformslike IBM Cloud.
Debug and troubleshoot issues in existing applications.
